char_info.char_desc: The Siren Who Swims at Fast Speeds

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Across my many trips to the Bamboo Forest of the Lost, I didn't even know it had a river to begin with.
Good morning, my Majesty. How are you today?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Woah... What kind of siren are you?
Even in my times, most sirens don't have hair this long.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I might have seen it with Empress Kaguya while she was under a curse that me and my husband had to break...
Well...
Mom?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I haven't seen you in a while. Is that siren in purple your mother?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yes, I am Kagami Ochiai's mother.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've heard every woman's hair including Reimu's grew absurdly long overnight.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: How come Kagami isn't affected?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Time travelers aren't affected. End of story.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm already beautiful enough with my own since I'm the Queen of the Federal Kingdom of Gensokyo.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Reimu doesn't need to be that beautiful.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Unlike other countries, Gensokyo is an outlier in terms of hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The hair of women is much longer compared to other countries.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I know that. Empress Kaguya was the one who popularized it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Speaking of the Empress, I heard this started in the Palace of Eternity in Chikurin.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Legends say you could run into some dangers in there.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'll need to challenge you to see if you can handle their danmaku!
